divs: Sighting DetailsIT WAS A BIG ROUND WHITE LIGHT.. I SEEN IT AFTER A STORM I WAS LOOKING AT THE CLOUDS WHEN SEEN A CLEAR SPOT COMING UP.. WHEN THE CLEAR SPOT CAME AND I WAS ABLE TO SEE THE SKY .. I SEEN THIS WHITE LIGHT MOVING THERE WAS NOTHING ELSE IN VIEW NOT THE MOON AND NO STARS JUST THE BLACK SKY AND THIS WHITE LIGHT MOVING AROUND .. I RUN IN2 THE HOUSE AND GOT MY CAMERA I JUST STARTED TAKING PICS .. I WAS ABLE TO GET 2 PICS ... 1 SHOWS THE BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT CLEAR AS DAY THE OTHER 1 SHOWS IT FLYING OR MOVING AWAY ..AND THE 3RD PIC SHOWS NOTHING .. IT WAS GONE AND IT TOOK OFF FAST WITH NO SOUND AT ALL.. NOT SAYING IT WAS A UFO AND I AM NOT SAYING IT WAS NOT A UFO .. IM NOT SURE WHAT IT WAS IS WHY I AM WRITING THIS ..
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hadley
This sighting has never been favorited.
